channel.title: Buttload of Ash-Covered Gems
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Buttload of Ash-Covered Gems" - I needs a sharpening stone.

item.title: Buttload of Ash-Covered Gems
item.content:encoded: If anyone would trade me a bunch of ash-covered gems I could appraise that would be swell. Will return you everything that is NOT a sharpening stone. Can throw in prize wheel super rares to the person whose gems get me a stone. Gamename is Marsalla.
